column4: hi ...i'm having a problem with sudo su - command....  i need to be able to sudo su - to a specific account, then execute a few command as that account. How can I do it in one command?
I didn't think you could do a non-interactive su on an account that had a password
i can do sudo su - to that account without being prompted for password
only because you have entered your sudo password in the last 5 minutes, try   sudo -k; sudo su - user
